tiles

Interface Connectable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Tile
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoulderWater, PlayerWater, Wall, Water

    public interface Connectable
extends Tile
    Author:
    Jelmer Firet interface for tiles that are able to adapt their texture to neighbouring tiles

    • Method Summary
